scripts.watch: npm run move:font && npm run watch:all
scripts.watch-windows: npm run move:font-windows && npm run watch:all
scripts.watch:all: parallelshell "npm run watch:css -s" "npm run watch:html -s" "npm run watch:js -s"
scripts.build: npm run clean -s && npm run move:font && npm run build:all
scripts.build-windows: npm run clean -s && npm run move:font-windows && npm run build:all
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run build:js
scripts.setupDist: mkdir dist/public && mkdir dist/public/js && mkdir dist/public/stylesheets
scripts.predeploy: npm run build && npm run setupDist && browserify --ignore-missing bin/www > dist/index.js
scripts.deploy: npm run copyCSS && npm run copyFonts && npm run copyHTML && npm run copyJS && npm run copyResources
